entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:15 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 11:47 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C
Wind: ESE 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 late this afternoon. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and flurries changing to flurries this evening. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
